First aid treatment - Safety position - Lateral safety position if unconscious - Leg elevation if blood pressure low

question.question: What is the recommended first aid treatment for an unconscious adult with low blood pressure?
question.option_b: Place the person in the lateral safety position and elevate their legs
question.option_c: Provide oxygen therapy and monitor vital signs
question.option_d: Give the person water to drink and keep them warm
